service.crud module

service.crud.add_into_table(cursor, table, data)

Insert a new record into a table.

Parameters:

  • cursor (MySQLCursor) – Database cursor.

  • table (str) – Table name.

  • data (dict) – Key-value pairs for column names and values.

Returns:

“SUCCESS” or “ERROR|<message>”.

Return type:

str

service.crud.get_all_from_table(cursor, table)

Retrieve all records from a table.

Parameters:

  • cursor (MySQLCursor) – Database cursor.

  • table (str) – Table name.

Returns:

List of all records, None if empty, or error message.

Return type:

list or None or str

service.crud.get_by_field(cursor, table, field, value, args)

Retrieve one or more rows from a table based on a specific field value.

Parameters:

  • cursor (MySQLCursor) – Database cursor.

  • table (str) – Table name.

  • field (str) – Field name to match.

  • value (any) – Value to search for.

  • args (str) – “all” to fetch all matches, anything else for one.

Returns:

Fetched result(s), None if not found, or error message.

Return type:

dict or list or None or str

service.crud.update_field(cursor, table, fields_values, id)

Update specific fields for a record identified by ID.

Parameters:

  • cursor (MySQLCursor) – Database cursor.

  • table (str) – Table name.

  • fields_values (dict) – Dictionary of field names and new values.

  • id (int) – ID of the row to update.

Returns:

“SUCCESS” or “ERROR|<message>”.

Return type:

str
